job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Translate business needs and architectural concepts into detailed, actionable technical specifications.
     * Conduct rigorous technical reviews to ensure compliance with architectural standards and best practices.
     * Lead the integration of diverse system components, guaranteeing seamless functionality.
     * Drive technical teams toward successful execution of architectural designs and project goals.
     * Manage relationships with key stakeholders, ensuring alignment and clear communication throughout project lifecycles.
     * Mentor junior colleagues, fostering their growth and building a culture of continuous learning.
     * Elevate the quality, security, and scalability of architectural implementations through expert insights and meticulous planning.
     * Provide cutting-edge technical advice and input for complex requests., As a Senior Data Engineer, you'll operate at the cutting edge of Solution and Enterprise Architecture, shaping data-driven solutions for leading global organizations. By working closely with Solution Architects, you'll translate high-level business challenges into detailed blueprints that deliver measurable outcomes.

   In collaboration with the Advanced Analytics and Big Data team-comprised of hybrid data engineers and data scientists-you'll transform business opportunities into state-of-the-art architectures and solutions. Your work will span industries such as retail, banking, and healthcare, ensuring every solution is tailored to the unique needs of each client.

   You'll get hands-on with cloud-native technologies, open-source tools, and cutting-edge AI (including Generative AI), driving innovation and helping businesses become resilient, data-driven powerhouses. Together with your team, you'll tackle complex analytical challenges and lead the design, development, and implementation of future-proof Data and AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Data Engineer (Advanced Analytics)

* Translate business needs and architectural concepts into detailed, actionable technical specifications.
     * Conduct rigorous technical reviews to ensure compliance with architectural standards and best practices.
     * Lead the integration of diverse system components, guaranteeing seamless functionality.
     * Drive technical teams toward successful execution of architectural designs and project goals.
     * Manage relationships with key stakeholders, ensuring alignment and clear communication throughout project lifecycles.
     * Mentor junior colleagues, fostering their growth and building a culture of continuous learning.
     * Elevate the quality, security, and scalability of architectural implementations through expert insights and meticulous planning.
     * Provide cutting-edge technical advice and input for complex requests., As a Senior Data Engineer, you'll operate at the cutting edge of Solution and Enterprise Architecture, shaping data-driven solutions for leading global organizations. By working closely with Solution Architects, you'll translate high-level business challenges into detailed blueprints that deliver measurable outcomes.

   In collaboration with the Advanced Analytics and Big Data team-comprised of hybrid data engineers and data scientists-you'll transform business opportunities into state-of-the-art architectures and solutions. Your work will span industries such as retail, banking, and healthcare, ensuring every solution is tailored to the unique needs of each client.

   You'll get hands-on with cloud-native technologies, open-source tools, and cutting-edge AI (including Generative AI), driving innovation and helping businesses become resilient, data-driven powerhouses. Together with your team, you'll tackle complex analytical challenges and lead the design, development, and implementation of future-proof Data and AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and the description heavily emphasizes data engineering, architecture, and traditional software development practices. While 'cutting-edge AI (including Generative AI)' is mentioned, it appears as a tool or area of application rather than the core focus of building and deploying GenAI models themselves.

phrases: Translate business needs and architectural concepts into detailed, actionable technical specifications
translate high-level business challenges into detailed blueprints that deliver measurable outcomes
transform business opportunities into state-of-the-art architectures and solutions
ensuring every solution is tailored to the unique needs of each client
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions and architectures.

phrases: Senior Data Engineer
shaping data-driven solutions
advanced analytics
hybrid data engineers
future-proof Data and AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: The job title and explicit mention of 'data-driven solutions', 'advanced analytics', and 'data engineers' directly point to data engineering responsibilities.
